body:
It has been a very long time since I have done an AMA. This will be the first one I'm doing after getting Moderator.

I feel as though not too much of the community knows me too well, so I decided to make it possible for player to learn more about me, and who I am, as well as what my intentions are. I sometimes feel detached from people, and would love to fill that void with friendship and camaraderie. Hopefully I will be able to take benefit from this post and also learn a little more about the community, and become the best person possible. Feel free to ask questions, just make them a little relevant and so you can actually learn something that is worth knowing about me. Also, please do not ask questions that are too personal (use self judgement). 

I look forward to answering all your questions!
Your friend, Frustration (kammy878)

title: Frustration's AMA [Please Read OP] :D

replies.body:
Please refer to the OP and post questions that others may find useful as well. I'll still answer though :P
Hmm.. let's see, I have some conditions. Do you get easily frustrated, because I need someone who isn't so there will be an equal balance in the world, else the illuminati will turn in to a square and the world will turn into minecraft. Along with that, we will all get blown up by kreepers. But for real though, do you have  enuf  sweg  5 me or naw? Because if not, spoderman will 10 hart me.

replies.body: JJ, I might change my skin soon though. But then I'll be known by something else, as I don't change my skin often, but so far, am Charmy5life.
replies.body_tagged: JJ, I might change my skin soon though. But then I'll be known by something else, as I don't change my skin often, but so far, am Charmy5life.

replies.body: Yes, ily. My Homie Gee. But in all honesty, when I was promoted to Jr. Mod, you were the support that I needed, and you really helped me on my journey. Also, you were a great inspiration and have cheered me up when I was sad, as well as pushed me forward to strive to reach my goals. Thanks Cal, ily :D <3

replies.body:
Kentucky Fried Charmy? Plzplzplzplzplz

How many licks to the center of a lollipop?
replies.body_tagged:
Kentucky Fried Charmy? Plzplzplzplzplz

How many licks to the center of a lollipop?

replies.body:
@Nuclear Yes Ily <3 Everyone is my best friend :D

Also, yes, eventually I will aspire to become a Sr. Moderator. At this time though, I still have plenty of time and mistakes to go through before I'm ready to hold such a role. :P


@Milki Bruhh.... I have illoominati on my side, and they don't like to eat or fry Kentucky Fried Charmanders. They despise that, and will send out the OICK (Official Iloominati Kool Kids) To deter those against the Charmanders. One thing I do love though is Nebraska frozen Milk Cream (Ice cream) :D Yumm =D

And yes, it takes three licks to get to the center of a tootsie pop, because iloominati invented it, and they are all about the "three" (For example, YOLO doesn't apply to them, they don't only live once, they only live thrice) life, so obviously, the answer is three licks. (Also, you have to lick in the shape of a triangle, trust me, it works :c )
replies.body_tagged:
@Nuclear Yes Ily <3 Everyone is my best friend :D

Also, yes, eventually I will aspire to become a Sr. Moderator. At this time though, I still have plenty of time and mistakes to go through before I'm ready to hold such a role. :P

They despise that, and will send out the OICK (Official Iloominati Kool Kids) To deter those against the Charmanders. One thing I do love though is Nebraska frozen Milk Cream (Ice cream) :D Yumm =D

And yes, it takes three licks to get to the center of a tootsie pop, because iloominati invented it, and they are all about the "three" (For example, YOLO doesn't apply to them, they don't only live once, they only live thrice) life, so obviously, the answer is three licks. (Also, you have to lick in the shape of a triangle, trust me, it works :c )

replies.body:
Sorry if this is super long Kammy xD

1) Whats your (full) name?
2) How old are you?
3) Whats your Birthday?
4) What starsign does that make it?
5) Whats your favourite colour?
6) Whats your lucky number?
7) Do you have any pets?
8) Where are you from?
9) How tall are you?
10) What shoe size are you?
11) How many pairs of shoes do you own?
12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make?
13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have?
14) and what would your hero name be?
15) and what outfit would you wear?
16) What was your last dream about?
17) What would you do if you won the lottery?
18) Would you like to build/design your own house?
19) Which form of public transport do you prefer?
20) What talents do you have?
21) Can you juggle?
22) Can you solve a rubix cube?
23) Do you have a cherished childhood teddybear?
24) Are you psychic in any way?
25) Are you a good dancer?
26) Are you a good singer?
27) Are you a good cook?
28) Are you a good artist?
29) Are you a good listener?
30) Are you a good public speaker?
31) Are you a good babysitter?
32) Are you a good mechanic?
33) Are you a good diplomat?
34) Are you a good employee?
35) Are you a good dresser?
36) Are you a good swimmer?
37) Are you a good skier?
38) Are you a good lover?
39) Are you a good musician?
40) Are you a good comedian?
41) Are you a good cleaner?
42) Are you a good actor?
43) Are you a good writer?
44) Have you ever been bungee jumping?
45) Have you ever been canoeing/kayaking?
46) What types of holidays do you prefer?
47) Whats the furthest you've ever been on holiday?
48) What was your favourite holiday?
49) Where would your dream holiday be?
50) Can you tap dance?
51) Whats your favourite zoo animal?
52) Whats your favourite sport?
53) Whats your favourite food?
54) Whats your favourite pizza topping?

EDIT: Removed 46 of them ;p
